member.name: M:Python.Test.ThreadTest.CallEchoString(System.String)
member.summary: This method calls back into the CPython runtime - tests call this from Python to check that we don't hang on nested transitions from managed to Python code and back.

member.name: T:Python.Test.DocWithCtorTest
member.summary: Supports units tests for exposing docstrings from C# to Python
member.remarks: Classes with a constructor have their docstring set to the ctor signature. Test if a class has an explicit doc string it gets set correctly.

member.summary: Supports units tests for access to types without a namespace.
